Nearly 66% of small businesses have been impacted by #COVID19.

On Saturday's #MSMEDay, @ITCNews calls for greater fiscal support from governments to ensure micro, small & medium-sized enterprises recover better. https://t.co/E3vWoC770y https://t.co/tP0o8VVSuo

From the #COVID19 pandemic to the climate crisis, the UN has been at the forefront of finding solutions to challenges that respect no borders.

At #UN75, let's take #ClimateAction to create a future of prosperity & well-being, while protecting our planet. https://t.co/JErkY8CGEE https://t.co/NeqzrgNrjX

#FBF to 1945 during the signing ceremony for the UN Charter in San Francisco, California.

As we mark the 75th anniversary of the signing of the UN Charter on Friday, we are reminded of the importance of finding global solutions to global challenges. https://t.co/4Ga3NNmlQH #UN75 https://t.co/qBth0LhynW

Torture is an egregious abuse of human rights. Let us honour the victims of torture and work to achieve a world where such abuse cannot happen.

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's International Day in Support of Victims of Torture. https://t.co/tkRgINieMC https://t.co/ituNJcPe0j

Together, we can develop sustainable alternatives to illicit drug cultivation, promote justice and advance prevention, treatment & rehabilitation services for drug use.

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #WorldDrugDay: https://t.co/0ttz8hpZpx https://t.co/xYRfA0V9LC

As Sudan faces a dire economic situation exacerbated by #COVID19, countries pledged $1.8 billion to support the country's democratic transition and provide assistance to the most vulnerable. 

https://t.co/DGaLTYuYqs

"We have a timeless guide to tackle our shared challenges & fix the world’s fragilities. That guide is the United Nations Charter."

-- @antonioguterres on the 75th anniversary of the UN Charter. https://t.co/2Ybov12ood #UN75 https://t.co/WbZWlN1s5T

The drugs trade finances organized crime & terrorism and harms development.

"We can’t go back to the way things were before the pandemic. The UN is strongly committed to leading a fairer, more sustainable renewal."

-- @antonioguterres on UN's #COVID19 response. https://t.co/1U1xBefAIc https://t.co/ohkxgFAAj9

#TBT to August 2019 as health care professionals in the Democratic Republic of the Congo worked to save lives & stop the spread of Ebola. 

On Thursday, @WHO announced the end of the one of the longest & deadliest outbreaks in Ebola history. https://t.co/5ANQbz52d3 https://t.co/uTU0oqMeJ3

All around the world people are countering misinformation about #COVID19. In Uganda @grassrootspeace is making sure verified information reaches rural communities.

Sign up to Verified to receive content you can trust: life-saving info & fact-based advice. https://t.co/9cNARGlEUN https://t.co/GbQyY2YhwF

Global drug use is on the rise. Around 269 million people used drugs in 2018, 30% more than in 2009. 

New @UNODC's report calls all countries to tackle illicit drug trafficking & offer evidence-based services for drug use disorders. https://t.co/Uy5ZkQdXcO https://t.co/OYLx1FlliW

#TBT to 1945 when the stage was set in San Francisco, California for the signing of the UN Charter.

Today, amid the #COVID19 crisis & other challenges, the global cooperation that created the UN is more important than ever. https://t.co/2Ybov12ood #UN75 https://t.co/8cE0vS0HeL
From supporting domestic violence survivors to delivering essential medical equipment, the UN's work continues to help people & communities throughout the #coronavirus crisis. https://t.co/vyvmWAFHGQ

This year, more than ever, all countries must honour seafarers by recognizing them as key workers & providing the necessary travel assistance to ensure safe crew changeovers & repatriations.

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's #DayoftheSeafarer. https://t.co/DpooM4GwU7 https://t.co/dsVBROpbPx

The annexation of parts of the occupied West Bank would constitute a serious violation of international law & grievously harm the prospect of a two-State solution.

-- @antonioguterres to UN Security Council on Wednesday. https://t.co/DqIS7UOulq https://t.co/ForzFyhHkj

170 signatories have expressed their support for @antonioguterres' call for a global ceasefire.

They are urging unity & solidarity to help bring peace to conflict-prone regions as they confront #COVID19. 

https://t.co/ckwOFZGyRK

Seafarers are key workers on the #COVID19 frontline, maintaining the flow of vital goods, such as food, medicines & medical supplies. 

On Thursday's #DayoftheSeafarer, join @IMOHQ in saying thank you to all those who serve the sea. https://t.co/DpooM4GwU7 https://t.co/YlEyomHWMC

It's not a shameful thing to be taken in by misinformation. People share things when it resonates with their preconceived view of the world. 

-- Renée DiResta (@noUpside) explains why we share misleading information online and how it spreads.

https://t.co/LV9n3DX6QM https://t.co/9BLCeVDRgn

#COVID19 has demonstrated the interconnected nature of our world – and that no one is safe until everyone is safe.  

Only by acting in solidarity can communities save lives & recover from the #coronavirus crisis. https://t.co/oAJhpGr0EH

The negative economic impacts of #COVID19 are unprecedented.

@IMFNews says greater multilateral cooperation, stronger healthcare systems & a shift toward #ClimateAction policies needed to recover better. https://t.co/sOGOjWyrj6 https://t.co/NLskxLB2hc

The UN champions gender equality so every woman & girl can exercise her human rights & live up to her full potential. 

Equality, dignity, peace & all the ideals of the UN Charter, agreed 75 years ago this week, are now more key than ever.

.@UNMAS & partners clear explosive ordnance - helping to create #SafeGround - and turning minefields into playing fields.

Human rights
Equality 
Dignity for all

The ideals laid out in the UN Charter, signed 75 years ago, belong to everyone -  to you. 

Add your photo to 1 of the photo filters that carry the key words from the Charter & celebrate its 75th birthday! 

https://t.co/tqFgLnxr77 #UN75 https://t.co/8TVGMdWEfa

Only 10% of countries have laws in place that help ensure inclusive education.
